wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Miller Reid  (1897–1959) was a 20th-century Scottish schoolmaster and noted amateur botanist and botanical author.

response: * Douglas Miller Reid FRSE FLS FZS (1897–1959) biology teacher at Harrow 1921 to 1953, noted botanical author
* Douglas Miller Reid FRSE FLS FZS (1897–1959) – teacher at Harrow School and noted botanical author
